item.title: Copilot Data Conversion
item.description: Converting data to different formats with copilot Recently, I got a question from a client if GitHub Copilot would be able to convert data from a table designer tool into working test files. The answer is probably yes! The only requirement is that the table designer tool is able to export its table (or tables) into a textual format, like SQL, JSON or CSV. Here’s how you could achieve this with Copilot:
